abilities.name: Swashbuckle
abilities.description: Vector Targeted. Pangolier dashes along the target line, then slashes all enemies in the drawn direction with several quick swipes.Lucky Shot has a chance to activate from this damage.

abilities.name: Shield Crash
abilities.description: Pangolier jumps in the air and slams back to the ground in front of his current position, damaging all enemies in a radius. For each enemy hero hit, he gains a percentage of incoming damage reduction for a short time.Forward movement is maintained if Shield Crash is used while Rolling Thunder is active, and allows Rolling Thunder to clear walls or cliffs.

abilities.name: Lucky Shot
abilities.description: Pangolier rolls the dice and lets fate decide the outcome for his enemies. Grants a chance to slow, apply a Disarm and reduce armor.

abilities.name: Rolling Thunder
abilities.description: Pangolier curls into a spell-immune ball and rolls out. When rolling, he moves at an increased speed and can move through trees, but has a decreased ability to turn. Striking enemies knocks them back, inflicting damage and stunning them when they land.Colliding with walls or cliffs will cause a temporary pause while Pangolier reverses in direction.
actions: Turn Rate in Degrees per Second

abilities.name: Stop Rolling
abilities.description: Halt!

abilities.name: Illusory Orb
abilities.description: Puck launches a magic orb that floats in a straight path, damaging enemy units along the way. At any point, Puck may teleport to the orb's location using Ethereal Jaunt.

abilities.name: Ethereal Jaunt
abilities.description: Teleports Puck to a flying Illusory Orb.

abilities.name: Waning Rift
abilities.description: Puck teleports to the target location and releases a burst of faerie dust that deals damage and silences enemy units nearby.

abilities.name: Phase Shift
abilities.description: Puck briefly shifts into another dimension where it is immune from harm.

abilities.name: Dream Coil
abilities.description: Creates a coil of volatile magic that latches onto enemy Heroes, stunning them for 0.5 seconds, damaging and leashing them. If the enemy hero stretches the coil by moving too far away, it snaps, stunning and dealing additional damage.

abilities.name: Shadow Strike
abilities.description: Hurls a poisoned dagger which deals large initial damage, and then deals damage over time. The poisoned unit has its movement speed slowed for 15 seconds. An instance of damage is dealt every 3 seconds.

abilities.name: Blink
abilities.description: Short distance teleportation that allows Queen of Pain to move in and out of combat.

abilities.name: Scream of Pain
abilities.description: The Queen of Pain lets loose a piercing scream around her, damaging nearby enemies.

abilities.name: Sonic Wave
abilities.description: Creates a gigantic wave of sound in front of Queen of Pain, dealing heavy damage to all enemy units in its wake and pushing them back.

abilities.name: Spell Block
abilities.description: There is no description for this ability.

abilities.name: Nether Blast
abilities.description: An exploding pulse deals damage to enemies and structures in the area. Deals half damage to structures.

abilities.name: Decrepify
abilities.description: A powerful banishing spell that slows a unit and renders it unable to attack or be attacked. Afflicted units take extra magic damage.

abilities.name: Nether Ward
abilities.description: Pugna places a Nether Ward at the target location. The ward causes nearby enemy heroes to lose a percentage of their max mana every second, and will fire at any enemy hero who casts a spell. Nether Ward deals base damage plus the damage multiplier of the mana spent by the enemy hero.
actions: Max Mana as Mana Regen Reduction

abilities.name: Life Drain
abilities.description: When cast on an enemy, Pugna drains health from the target enemy unit to heal himself and grant vision over the target. If Pugna has full HP, and the enemy target is a Hero, Life Drain will restore mana instead.When cast on an ally, Pugna will drain his own health into his ally.

abilities.name: Icarus Dive
abilities.description: Phoenix dives forward in an arc with a fixed distance in the targeted direction, dealing damage over time and slowing the movement speed of any units it comes into contact with, and then orbiting back to its original position. If Phoenix casts Supernova, the dive ends.

abilities.name: Stop Icarus Dive
abilities.description: Immediately cancels the dive.

abilities.name: Fire Spirits
abilities.description: Summons 4 fire spirits that circle around Phoenix. Each spirit can be launched independently at a targeted area of effect. Affected enemy units take damage over time and have their attack speed greatly reduced.

abilities.name: Launch Fire Spirit
abilities.description: Each fire spirit can be launched independently at a targeted area of effect. Affected enemy units take damage over time and have their attack speed greatly reduced.

abilities.name: Sun Ray
abilities.description: Phoenix expels a beam of light at the cost of its own health. The beam damages enemies and heals allies for a base amount plus a percentage of their health. The percentage increases as the beam continues to fire.
actions: Current Health as Cost per Second
Max Health as Damage per Second
Max Health as Heal per Second
Turn Rate in Degrees per Second

abilities.name: Toggle Movement
abilities.description: Toggles slow forward movement during Sun Ray firing.

abilities.name: Stop Sun Ray
abilities.description: Immediately stops the Sun Ray.

abilities.name: Supernova
abilities.description: The Phoenix willingly ends its current life for the chance to be reborn. Transforms into a burning sun that scorches enemies in a huge area. The sun can be destroyed by attacks from enemy Heroes. After 6 seconds the sun explodes, stunning all nearby enemies while restoring Phoenix to full health and mana with refreshed abilities.

abilities.name: Plasma Field
abilities.description: Releases a wave of energetic plasma that grows in power as it expands, but also zaps on contraction, slowing and dealing damage to enemy units caught in its path. Damage and slow increases with distance from Razor. The Plasma Field hits each unit twice, once each direction.

abilities.name: Static Link
abilities.description: Creates a charged link between Razor and an enemy Hero, stealing damage from the target and giving it to Razor. Allows razor to attack while moving with the link active.

abilities.name: Storm Surge
abilities.description: Passively increases your movement speed.

abilities.name: Eye of the Storm
abilities.description: A powerful lightning storm strikes out at enemy units with the lowest health, dealing damage and reducing their armor.

twentieth: -0.1 Eye of the Storm Strike Interval

abilities.name: Meat Hook
abilities.description: Launches a bloody hook toward a unit or location. The hook will snag the first unit it encounters, dragging the unit back to Pudge and dealing damage if it is an enemy.

abilities.name: Rot
abilities.description: A toxic cloud that deals intense damage and slows movement--harming not only enemy units but Pudge himself.

abilities.name: Flesh Heap
abilities.description: Gives Pudge increased magic resistance, as well as bonus strength that increases each time Pudge kills an enemy Hero or it dies in his vicinity. Flesh Heap is retroactive, meaning it can gain charges before it is skilled, which then become active.

abilities.name: Dismember
abilities.description: Pudge chows down on an enemy unit, disabling it and dealing damage over time. Pudge gets healed for the same amount he damages. Lasts longer on creeps.
actions: Base Damage and Heal per Second
Strength as Damage and Heal per Second
Ally Max Health as Health Regen

abilities.name: Eject
abilities.description: Ejects the swallowed allied hero inside of you.

abilities.name: Disruption
abilities.description: Banishes the targeted unit from the battlefield for a short duration. Upon returning, two illusions of the banished unit are created under Shadow Demon's control.

abilities.name: Soul Catcher
abilities.description: Captures the soul of enemy units in an area, causing them to lose a percentage of their current health. When the debuff is removed, the units gain half of the lost health back. Units under the effect of Disruption can still be affected by Soul Catcher.

abilities.name: Shadow Poison
abilities.description: Deals damage in a line, and afflicts enemy units with a poison effect. The poison deals 1/2/4/8/16 times the stack damage based on the number of stacks on the target, up to 5 stacks. Additional stacks cause 50 damage each. This deferred damage is dealt when Shadow Poison's duration is expired, or the Release sub-ability is used.

abilities.name: Shadow Poison Release
abilities.description: Releases the poison to do damage on all affected enemies. Units under the effect of Disruption can still be affected by Shadow Poison.

abilities.name: Demonic Purge
abilities.description: Purges the target enemy unit, removing positive buffs, and slowing the target for the duration. The unit slowly regains its movement speed until the end of the duration, upon which damage is dealt. Units under the effect of Disruption can still be affected by Demonic Purge.

abilities.name: Smoke Screen
abilities.description: Throws down a smoke bomb, silencing enemies, and causing them to miss attacks.

abilities.name: Blink Strike
abilities.description: Teleports behind the target unit, striking for bonus damage if it is an enemy.

abilities.name: Tricks of the Trade
abilities.description: Riki phases out of the world while striking random enemy units from behind in an area around him.

abilities.name: Cloak and Dagger
abilities.description: Riki fades into the shadows, becoming invisible. Every time Riki strikes his enemy from behind, he deals bonus damage based on his Agility. When Riki attacks, he becomes visible.

abilities.name: Shadowraze (Near)
abilities.description: Shadow Fiend razes the ground directly in front of him, dealing damage to enemy units in the area. Adds a stacking damage amplifier on the target that causes the enemy to take bonus Shadow Raze damage per stack.

abilities.name: Shadowraze (Medium)
abilities.description: Shadow Fiend razes the ground a short distance away from him, dealing damage to enemy units in the area. Adds a stacking damage amplifier on the target that causes the enemy to take bonus Shadow Raze damage per stack.

abilities.name: Shadowraze (Far)
abilities.description: Shadow Fiend razes the ground a longer distance away from him, dealing damage to enemy units in the area. Adds a stacking damage amplifier on the target that causes the enemy to take bonus Shadow Raze damage per stack.

abilities.name: Necromastery
abilities.description: Shadow Fiend steals the soul from units he kills, gaining bonus damage. On death, he releases half of them from bondage.

abilities.name: Presence of the Dark Lord
abilities.description: Shadow Fiend's presence reduces the armor of nearby enemies.

abilities.name: Requiem of Souls
abilities.description: Shadow Fiend gathers his captured souls to release them as lines of demonic energy. Units near Shadow Fiend when the souls are released can be damaged by several lines of energy. Any unit damaged by Requiem of Souls will be feared and have its movement speed reduced for 0.8 seconds for each line hit. Lines of energy are created for every 1 souls captured through Necromastery.Requiem of Souls is automatically cast whenever Shadow Fiend dies, regardless of its cooldown.
actions: Heal per Hit Hero on Return

abilities.name: Telekinesis
abilities.description: Rubick uses his telekinetic powers to lift the enemy into the air briefly and then hurls them back at the ground. The unit lands on the ground with such force that it stuns nearby enemies.

abilities.name: Telekinesis Land
abilities.description: Chooses the location the target will land when Telekinesis finishes.

abilities.name: Fade Bolt
abilities.description: Rubick creates a powerful stream of arcane energy that travels between enemy units, dealing damage and reducing their attack damage. Each jump deals less damage.

abilities.name: Arcane Supremacy
abilities.description: Rubick's mastery of the arcane allows him to deal more spell damage and create spells that last longer on enemies.

abilities.name: Spell Steal
abilities.description: Rubick studies the trace magical essence of one enemy hero, learning the secrets of the last spell the hero cast. Rubick can use this spell as his own for several minutes or until he dies.

abilities.name: Burrowstrike
abilities.description: Sand King burrows into the ground and tunnels forward, damaging and stunning enemy units above him as he resurfaces.

abilities.name: Sand Storm
abilities.description: Sand King creates a fearsome sandstorm that damages enemy units while hiding him from vision. The effect ends when Sand King leaves the area.

abilities.name: Caustic Finale
abilities.description: Sand King's attacks inject a venom that causes enemy units to move more slowly and to violently explode when it dies.

abilities.name: Epicenter
abilities.description: After channeling for 2 seconds, Sand King sends a disturbance into the earth, causing it to shudder violently. All enemies caught within range will take damage and become slowed. Each subsequent pulse increases the radius of damage dealt.

abilities.name: Ether Shock
abilities.description: Creates a cone of ethereal energy that strikes multiple enemy units.

abilities.name: Hex
abilities.description: Transforms an enemy unit into a harmless creature, disabling their attacks and abilities.

abilities.name: Shackles
abilities.description: Magically binds an enemy unit so that it cannot move or attack, while dealing damage over time.

abilities.name: Mass Serpent Ward
abilities.description: Summons 10 Serpent Wards to attack enemy units and structures. The Wards are immune to magic.

abilities.name: Arcane Curse
abilities.description: Curses the target area, causing enemy heroes to take damage and slowing their movement speed. Anytime affected enemies cast a spell, the duration is increased.

abilities.name: Glaives of Wisdom
abilities.description: Silencer enchants his glaives with his wisdom, dealing additional damage based on his Intelligence. Silencer temporarily steals his target's intelligence with each hit.

abilities.name: Last Word
abilities.description: Enchants a target, providing vision of them and causing them to be damaged and silenced if they cast a spell or if the enchantment timer expires. Deals extra damage based on the difference in intelligence between Silencer and the target.

abilities.name: Global Silence
abilities.description: Silencer stops all sound, preventing enemy heroes and units on the map from casting spells.

abilities.name: Arcane Bolt
abilities.description: Skywrath Mage launches a slow-moving bolt of arcane magic, dealing damage to an enemy unit based on Skywrath Mage's intelligence.

abilities.name: Concussive Shot
abilities.description: Skywrath Mage sets off a long range shot that hits the closest hero within a long range. Upon impact, it deals damage and slows in an area of effect.

abilities.name: Ancient Seal
abilities.description: Skywrath Mage seals the targeted unit with an ancient rune, silencing it and causing it to take additional damage from spells.

abilities.name: Mystic Flare
abilities.description: Skywrath Mage uses his ultimate magical ability to conjure a precise and violent mystical field that lays waste to his adversaries. Deals massive damage distributed evenly among any Heroes in the area over 2.4 seconds.

abilities.name: Shrapnel
abilities.description: Consumes a charge to launch a ball of shrapnel that showers the target area in explosive pellets. Enemies are subject to damage and slowed movement. Reveals the targeted area. Shrapnel charges restore every 40 seconds.

abilities.name: Headshot
abilities.description: Sniper increases his accuracy, giving him a chance to deal extra damage and briefly knocks back his enemies.

abilities.name: Take Aim
abilities.description: Extends the attack range of Sniper's rifle. Can be activated to double the attack range bonus for 1 attack.

abilities.name: Assassinate
abilities.description: Sniper locks onto a target enemy unit and, after a short aiming duration, fires a devastating shot that deals damage at long range and mini-stuns the target.

abilities.name: Guardian Sprint
abilities.description: Slardar slithers ahead, moving significantly faster and passing through units. Slardar has unlocked max speed and grants movement speed while in the river.

abilities.name: Slithereen Crush
abilities.description: Slams the ground, stunning and damaging nearby enemy land units. After the stun, the affected units are slowed.

abilities.name: Bash of the Deep
abilities.description: After 3 attacks, your next attack will bash the target.

abilities.name: Corrosive Haze
abilities.description: Reduces enemy armor to amplify physical damage and provides True Sight and vision of the targeted unit, revealing invisibility.

abilities.name: Scatterblast
abilities.description: Snapfire unloads with a wide blast that damages and slows enemies in a cone. Enemies caught at point-blank range take an extra 50% damage.

abilities.name: Firesnap Cookie
abilities.description: Snapfire feeds a potent cookie to Mortimer or an ally, causing them to hop a short distance. The hopping unit stuns and damages enemies in the landing zone.

abilities.name: Lil' Shredder
abilities.description: Snapfire heats up her mounted turret to rapidly fire 6 fixed-damage attacks. Each attack reduces the enemy's armor. Provides bonus attack range for the duration.

abilities.name: Mortimer Kisses
abilities.description: Snapfire's friend launches a barrage of firespit globs over 6 seconds. Globs cause impact damage and create pools of firespit, which slow and apply damage over time. Snapfire has a reduced turn rate for the duration and a minimum launch range of 600. Each glob can be targeted with a right click.
actions: Turn Rate in Degrees per Second

abilities.name: Gobble Up
abilities.description: Mortimer gobbles up a creep or an allied hero, which he can then spit towards enemies. The unit stays in his belly up to 3 seconds.

abilities.name: Spit Out
abilities.description: Mortimer spits out the unit that's in his mouth, causing impact damage and stun in a large area. The glob leaves a pool of firespit that slows and applies damage over time.

twentieth: Lil' Shredder Uses Your Attack Damage

abilities.name: Dark Pact
abilities.description: After a short delay, Slark sacrifices some of his life blood, purging most negative debuffs and dealing damage to enemy units around him and to himself. Slark only takes 50% of the damage.

abilities.name: Pounce
abilities.description: Slark leaps forward, grabbing the first hero he connects with. That unit is leashed, and can only move a limited distance away from Slark's landing position.

abilities.name: Essence Shift
abilities.description: Slark steals the life essence of enemy heroes with his attacks, draining each of their attributes and converting them to bonus Agility. If Slark kills an affected enemy hero, he permanently steals 1 Agility.

abilities.name: Shadow Dance
abilities.description: When used, Slark hides himself in a cloud of shadows, becoming immune to detection. Attacking, casting spells, and using items will not reveal Slark. Passively, when not visible to the enemy team, Slark gains bonus movement speed and health regeneration.
actions: Max Health as Regen per Second

abilities.name: Static Remnant
abilities.description: Creates an explosively charged image of Storm Spirit that lasts 12 seconds and will detonate and deal damage if an enemy unit comes near it.

abilities.name: Electric Vortex
abilities.description: A vortex that pulls an enemy unit to Storm Spirit's location.

abilities.name: Overload
abilities.description: Casting a spell creates an electrical charge, which is released in a burst on Storm's next attack, dealing damage and slowing nearby enemies.

abilities.name: Ball Lightning
abilities.description: Storm Spirit becomes volatile electricity, charging across the battlefield until he depletes his mana or reaches his target. The activation mana cost is 30+8% of his total mana pool, and the cost per 100 units traveled is 10+0.65% of his total mana pool. Damage is expressed in damage per 100 units traveled.
actions: Max Mana as Cost per 100 Units

twentyfifth: 600 Distance Auto Remnant in Ball Lightning

abilities.name: Spectral Dagger
abilities.description: Spectre flings a dagger to draw a Shadow Path, dealing damage and slowing the movement speed of any enemies along the trail. Units hit by the dagger also trail a Shadow Path. While treading the path, Spectre phases through otherwise impassable terrain.

abilities.name: Desolate
abilities.description: Deals bonus damage whenever Spectre attacks an enemy that does not have any allied units within a 425 radius around them.

abilities.name: Dispersion
abilities.description: Damage done to Spectre is reflected on her enemies, leaving her unharmed. The effect lessens with distance.

abilities.name: Haunt
abilities.description: Creates a spectral nemesis to attack each enemy hero. At any moment during the duration, Spectre can use Reality to exchange places of a given haunt.Haunt illusions are uncontrollable, take extra damage, and deal less damage than Spectre herself. They ignore terrain.

abilities.name: Reality
abilities.description: Spectre exchanges places with a chosen Haunt.

abilities.name: Shadow Step
abilities.description: Allows you to perform a single target unit Haunt.

abilities.name: Charge of Darkness
abilities.description: Spirit Breaker fixes his sight on an enemy unit and starts charging through all objects. All enemy units passed through and the targeted unit will be hit by a Greater Bash. If the targeted unit dies, Spirit Breaker will change his target to the nearest enemy unit to that location.

abilities.name: Bulldoze
abilities.description: Spirit Breaker gains movement speed and status resistance to ram through enemies. Can be used while charging.

abilities.name: Greater Bash
abilities.description: Gives a chance to stun and knockback an enemy unit on an attack. Deals a percentage of movement speed as damage.

abilities.name: Nether Strike
abilities.description: Spirit Breaker slips into the nether realm, reappearing next to his hapless victim. Upon reappearing, a Greater Bash of the current level occurs and deals bonus damage. Knocks back for double the normal distance.

abilities.name: Refraction
abilities.description: Templar Assassin becomes highly elusive, avoiding damage and gaining a bonus to her damage. The damage and avoidance effects are separate, and have a limited number of instances.

abilities.name: Meld
abilities.description: Templar Assassin conceals herself, becoming invisible as long as she remains still. If Meld's invisibility is broken by attacking an enemy, Lanaya will deal bonus damage to the enemy and reduce their armor for 12 seconds.

abilities.name: Psi Blades
abilities.description: Templar Assassin's psi blades slice through the attacked unit, splitting and damaging enemy units directly behind it, while gaining bonus attack range.

abilities.name: Psionic Trap
abilities.description: Templar Assassin places mystical traps that invisibly monitor enemy movement. When sprung at her command, they exert a slowing influence of 30% in the area. Traps charge up to slow 60% after 4 seconds. Deals bonus damage when fully charged.

abilities.name: Trap
abilities.description: Springs the nearest trap, slowing nearby enemies.

abilities.name: Psionic Projection
abilities.description: Allows Templar Assassin to teleport to any Psionic Trap after a brief channel. Does not break meld. Detonates the Psionic Trap on arrival.

abilities.name: Trap
abilities.description: Springs the trap, slowing nearby enemies.

abilities.name: Storm Hammer
abilities.description: Sven unleashes his magical gauntlet that deals damage and stuns enemy units in a small area around the target.

abilities.name: Great Cleave
abilities.description: Sven strikes with great force, cleaving all nearby enemy units with his attack.

abilities.name: Warcry
abilities.description: Sven's Warcry heartens his allied heroes for battle, increasing their armor and movement speed. Lasts 8 seconds.

abilities.name: God's Strength
abilities.description: Sven channels his rogue strength, granting bonus damage for 40 seconds.

abilities.name: Proximity Mines
abilities.description: Plant an invisible mine that cannot be detected by True Sight, but is visible if an enemy is within the active 400 AoE of the mine. Mines detonate if an enemy is standing within the active AoE for 1.6 seconds. The explosion deals full damage in the blast radius, and deals 25% damage to buildings.

abilities.name: Stasis Trap
abilities.description: Plant an invisible trap that roots nearby enemy units instantly when triggered.

abilities.name: Blast Off!
abilities.description: Techies hurtle themselves into the enemy's midst, detonating charges upon impact which deal massive area of effect damage and silence enemies. Upon landing, the assault deals Techies damage equal to 50% of their max health.

abilities.name: Minefield Sign
abilities.description: Plant a warning sign to remind enemies to step lightly. Only one sign can exist at a time. Lasts 180 seconds.

abilities.name: Remote Mines
abilities.description: Plant an invisible explosive that will only detonate after a brief delay when triggered. Does not damage buildings.

abilities.name: Focused Detonate
abilities.description: Detonate all remote mines in the target area.

abilities.name: Pinpoint Detonate
abilities.description: Detonate all selected remote mines.

abilities.name: Laser
abilities.description: Fires an intense energy beam, dealing damage and blinding the target, causing it to miss all physical attacks.

abilities.name: Heat-Seeking Missile
abilities.description: Launches rockets at the nearest visible enemy heroes within 2500 range.

abilities.name: March of the Machines
abilities.description: Enlists an army of robotic minions to destroy enemy units in an area around Tinker.

abilities.name: Rearm
abilities.description: Resets the cooldown on most of Tinker's items and abilities.

abilities.name: Avalanche
abilities.description: Bombards an area with rocks, continuously doing small intervals of damage and stun to enemy units. Avalanche does 3x damage to units being tossed.

abilities.name: Toss
abilities.description: Grabs the nearest unit in a 275 radius around Tiny, ally or enemy, and launches it at the target unit or rune to deal damage where they land. If the tossed unit is an enemy, it will take an extra 30% damage.

abilities.name: Tree Grab
abilities.description: Grabs a tree to whack enemies on the head for a limited number of attacks. Grants bonus attack range. Attacks deal more damage and fully splash on units along the way. The tree can be thrown, to deal your attack to a unit at a distance.

abilities.name: Tree Throw
abilities.description: Throws the tree at the target unit, proccing your attack on it and splashing damage around the target.

abilities.name: Grow
abilities.description: Tiny gains craggy mass, increasing his attack damage, and armor, while slowing his attack speed.

abilities.name: Tree Volley
abilities.description: Tiny throws random trees within range towards the targeted aoe. Deals Tiny's attack damage plus a bonus to enemies in that area with each tree thrown.

abilities.name: Nature's Grasp
abilities.description: Creates vines towards the target location. Vines slow down and deal damage to enemies that walk through. Vines deal 50% more damage if they touch a tree. Does half damage to creeps.

abilities.name: Leech Seed
abilities.description: Treant plants a life-sapping seed in an enemy unit, draining its health, while simultaneously slowing it. The seed heals friendly units around it.

abilities.name: Living Armor
abilities.description: Infuses the target hero or structure with a protective coating which heals the target and provides bonus armor.
info: target point target unit target area

abilities.name: Nature's Guise
abilities.description: Provides Treant with Tree Walking whenever he hasn't taken damage for 3 seconds. While active, Treant gains movement speed bonus and amplified healing and regeneration on himself.

abilities.name: Overgrowth
abilities.description: Summons an overgrowth of vines and branches around Treant that prevent afflicted enemies from moving, blinking, going invisible, or attacking.

abilities.name: Eyes In The Forest
abilities.description: Treant Protector enchants a tree, which grants him unobstructed vision in that location. If Overgrowth is cast, units within a 800 radius of an enchanted tree will be entangled and damaged.

abilities.name: Gush
abilities.description: Summons a gush of water to damage an enemy unit, reducing their movement speed and armor. Lasts 4 seconds.

abilities.name: Kraken Shell
abilities.description: Thickens Tidehunter's hide to passively block a portion of any incoming physical attack damage. The hide also removes negative status effects if the damage taken crosses a threshold. Does not stack with items that provide Damage Block.

abilities.name: Anchor Smash
abilities.description: Tidehunter swings his mighty anchor to attack and deal bonus damage to nearby enemies and reduce their attack damage.

abilities.name: Ravage
abilities.description: Slams the ground, causing tentacles to erupt in all directions, damaging and stunning all nearby enemy units.

abilities.name: Reflection
abilities.description: Terrorblade brings forth an invulnerable dark reflection of all enemy heroes in a target area. Affected enemy heroes are slowed and attacked by their reflection.

abilities.name: Conjure Image
abilities.description: Creates an illusion of Terrorblade that deals damage.

abilities.name: Metamorphosis
abilities.description: Terrorblade transforms into a powerful demon with a ranged attack. Any of Terrorblade's illusions that are within 1200 range will also be transformed by Metamorphosis.

abilities.name: Terror Wave
abilities.description: There is no description for this ability.

abilities.name: Sunder
abilities.description: Severs the life from both Terrorblade and a target hero, exchanging a percentage of both units' current health. Some health points must remain.

abilities.name: Whirling Death
abilities.description: Timbersaw whirls extremely sharp edges, damaging enemies and destroying trees around him in an area. If an enemy hero is affected, it loses some of its primary attribute for a short duration. Whirling Death will deal bonus damage per tree destroyed.

abilities.name: Timber Chain
abilities.description: Timbersaw fires a chain that embeds itself in the first tree it hits, pulling him towards it. Any enemy in the path takes damage.

abilities.name: Reactive Armor
abilities.description: Each time Timbersaw is attacked, he gains increased health regen and armor.

abilities.name: Chakram
abilities.description: Fires your main saw blade at the target location where it will spin in place, dealing damage in an area around it. Enemies caught in the saw blade will move more slowly for every 5% of health missing. The blade deals damage and cuts down trees in its path when fired and retracted. While active the ability costs mana, and you lose the ability to attack.
actions: Move Speed Slow per 5% Max Health Missing

abilities.name: Return Chakram
abilities.description: Returns the Chakram to Timbersaw.

abilities.name: Second Chakram
abilities.description: Fires a secondary saw blade at the target location where it will spin in place, dealing damage in an area around it. Additionally, for each 5% of health missing, enemies caught in the saw blade move more slowly. The blade deals damage and cuts down trees in its path when fired and retracted. While active the ability costs mana, and you lose the ability to attack.
actions: Move Speed Slow per 5% Max Health Missing

abilities.name: Return Chakram (Aghanim's Scepter)
abilities.description: Returns the Chakram to Timbersaw.

abilities.name: Berserker's Rage
abilities.description: While active, Troll Warlord swaps from using ranged to melee attacks. Melee attacks have a chance to ensnare, preventing the target from moving or using mobility spells. Berserker's Rage also grants additional movement speed, armor, and decreases base attack time.Whirling Axes has different functionality while Berserker's Rage is active.

abilities.name: Whirling Axes (Ranged)
abilities.description: Troll hurls a fistful of five axes in a cone shape over 1000 range, slowing and damaging enemy units.

abilities.name: Whirling Axes (Melee)
abilities.description: Troll hurls two axes around him in a close range area of effect, damaging enemy units and causing them to miss some attacks.

abilities.name: Fervor
abilities.description: With each continuous blow on the same target, Troll gains increased attack speed. If Troll changes targets, the stacks drop to zero.

abilities.name: Battle Trance
abilities.description: Troll unleashes a powerful battle trance, that forces you to continuously attack the closest enemy unit within 900 range, prioritizing heroes. Damage does not kill you during this mode. Grants you bonus lifesteal, attack speed and movement speed. Applies a Basic Dispel.

abilities.name: Magic Missile
abilities.description: Fires a magic missile at an enemy unit, stunning and dealing damage.

abilities.name: Wave of Terror
abilities.description: Vengeful Spirit lets loose a wicked cry, weakening the armor of enemies and giving vision of the path ahead.

abilities.name: Vengeance Aura
abilities.description: Vengeful Spirit's presence increases the ranged attack range and primary attribute of nearby friendly units. Spawns a Strong Illusion of Vengeful Spirit when she dies that lasts until it is killed or Vengeful Spirit revives.

abilities.name: Nether Swap
abilities.description: Instantaneously swaps positions with a target Hero, friend or enemy. Nether Swap interrupts channeling abilities on the target.

abilities.name: Firestorm
abilities.description: Calls down waves of fire that damage enemy units in the target area, burning for additional damage over time.
actions: Max Health as Damage per Second

abilities.name: Pit of Malice
abilities.description: A deadly pit is conjured at the target location; any unit that enters will be rooted. Each enemy unit within the pit are affected every 3.6 seconds.

abilities.name: Atrophy Aura
abilities.description: Nearby enemy units are weakened, losing a portion of their base damage. If an enemy dies while under this effect, Underlord gains temporary bonus damage.
actions: Attack Damage Bonus per Hero Death
Attack Damage Bonus per Non-Hero Death

abilities.name: Dark Rift
abilities.description: Opens a dark rift at the targeted friendly unit's or building's position. After a short delay, Underlord and all nearby friendly heroes are teleported to that unit's location. Dark Rift can be cancelled at anytime during the cast. If it is cancelled in this way or the target unit dies before the spell becomes active, Dark Rift goes into cooldown.

abilities.name: Cancel Dark Rift
abilities.description: Stop the teleport.

abilities.name: Earthshock
abilities.description: Ursa leaps forward 250 units and slams the earth, causing a powerful shock to damage and slow all enemy units in a nearby area for 4 seconds.

abilities.name: Overpower
abilities.description: Using his skill in combat, Ursa gains increased attack speed for a number of subsequent attacks.

abilities.name: Fury Swipes
abilities.description: Ursa's claws dig deeper wounds in the enemy, causing consecutive attacks to the same enemy to deal more damage. If the same target is not attacked after 8/12/16/20 seconds, the bonus damage is lost.

abilities.name: Enrage
abilities.description: Ursa goes into a frenzy, providing damage reduction and status resistance. Removes any existing debuffs.

abilities.name: Decay
abilities.description: Undying steals strength from all enemy heroes in an area, dealing base damage as he claims the enemy's strength for himself.

abilities.name: Soul Rip
abilities.description: Undying rips health away from all nearby units and uses it to heal an ally, or damage an enemy. Soul Rip can also be used to heal Tombstone.

abilities.name: Tombstone
abilities.description: Summons a tombstone at the target point. Zombies will frequently spawn next to every enemy unit in the area around the Tombstone, and attack them. Zombies have the Deathlust ability, which causes their attacks to slow the target, and if the target reaches below a certain amount of health, increases the attack and movement speed of the zombie.

abilities.name: Flesh Golem
abilities.description: Undying transforms into a horrifying flesh golem. Gains a percentage increase to strength and imbues attacks with a slow and damage amplification.

abilities.name: Reincarnation
abilities.description: There is no description for this ability.

abilities.name: Deathlust
abilities.description: Slows enemy units on attack. If the attacked unit's health goes below the threshold, the zombie receives enhanced movement and attack speed.

abilities.name: Spell Immunity
abilities.description: This creature does not feel the effects of most magical spells.

abilities.name: Ice Shards
abilities.description: Tusk compresses shards of ice into a ball of frozen energy that damages all enemies it comes in contact with. When the ball reaches its target destination the shards are released, creating a barrier that lasts for 4/5/6/7 seconds.

abilities.name: Snowball
abilities.description: Tusk begins rolling into a snowball. Allies within a 350 radius can also be added to the snowball by right-clicking on them, even while the snowball is moving. Once launched, any enemies caught in the snowball's path will be stunned and take damage. Each allied Hero in the snowball will add to its damage.

abilities.name: Launch Snowball
abilities.description: Launch the snowball toward the target.

abilities.name: Tag Team
abilities.description: Temporarily applies a negative debuff aura around you, causing enemies that are attacked under it to take bonus physical damage and reduced movement speed. Lasts 5 seconds.

abilities.name: Walrus PUNCH!
abilities.description: Tusk connects with his mighty Walrus Punch, a critical strike so powerful it launches its victim into the air. The victim is slowed upon landing.

abilities.name: Walrus Kick
abilities.description: Kicks the target unit back, damaging them and slowing their movement speed.

abilities.name: Poison Attack
abilities.description: Intensifies Viper's venom, adding an effect to his normal attack that applies a stacking movement speed slow and magic resistance deduction while dealing damage over time. Stacks up to 5 times.

abilities.name: Nethertoxin
abilities.description: Viper releases a Nethertoxin at the targeted area. Units in that area take an increasing damage over time based on how long they remain in it. Disables passives of affected units.

abilities.name: Corrosive Skin
abilities.description: Viper exudes an infectious toxin that damages and slows the attack speed of any enemy that damages it in a 1400 radius. The acid exudate also increases Viper's resistance to magic.

abilities.name: Viper Strike
abilities.description: Viper slows the targeted enemy unit's movement and attack speed while also dealing poison damage over time. The slowing effect reduces over the duration of the poison.

abilities.name: Grave Chill
abilities.description: Visage drains the movement and attack speed of the targeted unit, gaining it for itself.

abilities.name: Soul Assumption
abilities.description: Visage gathers charges of soul essence each time nearby heroes take more than 100 damage. When the essence is released, it deals base damage as well as damage for each gathered soul charge.

abilities.name: Gravekeeper's Cloak
abilities.description: Visage generates a layered barrier that protects him from damage. If he receives damage from a player, one layer is removed, and takes time to recover.

abilities.name: Summon Familiars
abilities.description: Conjures two blind Familiars to fight for Visage. Familiars possess the Stone Form ability, that allows them to turn into stone, stunning enemies upon landing. While in Stone Form, Familiars are invulnerable, and rapidly regenerate their health. Familiars grant high bounty when killed.

abilities.name: Stone Form
abilities.description: After a short delay, the nearest Familiar turns into stone and smashes into the ground, stunning and damaging all targets in the area. The Familiar becomes invulnerable, and will regain its health very rapidly. After 6 seconds, the Familiar will automatically leave Stone Form.

abilities.name: Stone Form
abilities.description: After a short delay, the Familiar turns into stone and smashes into the ground, stunning and damaging all targets in the area. The Familiar becomes invulnerable, and will regain its health very rapidly. After 6 seconds, the Familiar will automatically leave Stone Form.

abilities.name: Fatal Bonds
abilities.description: Binds several enemy units together, causing a percentage of the damage dealt to one of them to be felt by the others.

abilities.name: Shadow Word
abilities.description: Warlock whispers an incantation, healing a friendly unit or damaging an enemy unit over time.

abilities.name: Upheaval
abilities.description: A powerful slowing current that grows stronger as it's channelled. Lasts up to 16 seconds. Enemies are slowed for 3 seconds after leaving the area or the spell ends.

abilities.name: Chaotic Offering
abilities.description: Summons a Golem from the depths, stunning enemies for one second. The Golem lives 60 seconds, takes reduced damage from spells, has Permanent Immolation and Flaming Fists on attack.

abilities.name: Flaming Fists
abilities.description: Deals extra damage to nearby units when attacking.

abilities.name: Permanent Immolation
abilities.description: Burns the Golem's nearby enemy units, with damage per second.

twentyfifth: 80% Magic Resistance for Chaotic Offering Golems

abilities.name: Aether Remnant
abilities.description: Vector targeted. Void Spirit dispatches a remnant to the target location. The remnant stands watch over the region, facing the direction of his vector. When a unit crosses its gaze, the remnant pulls it in and damages it.

abilities.name: Dissimilate
abilities.description: Void Spirit temporarily fades into the aether, creating a number of portals through which he can reassemble himself. Upon exiting a portal, he damages all enemies in the area.

abilities.name: Resonant Pulse
abilities.description: Void Spirit wraps himself in a protective shield that absorbs physical damage and emits a single damaging pulse around him. The shield gains increased damage absorption for each enemy hero the pulse hits.

abilities.name: Astral Step
abilities.description: Void Spirit tears a rift through the astral plane to appear at the target location, attacking all enemies along the path. This attack inflicts a void mark that slows for 1.25 seconds and then detonates.

abilities.name: The Swarm
abilities.description: Weaver launches a swarm of 12 young Weavers that latch on any enemy unit in their path, attacking and reducing armor until it is killed.

abilities.name: Shukuchi
abilities.description: Weaver shifts out of visibility, gaining bonus movement speed and the ability to ignore the movement speed limit --doing harm to any enemies it passes through.

abilities.name: Geminate Attack
abilities.description: Allows Weaver to dispatch two attacks at once.

abilities.name: Time Lapse
abilities.description: Weaver warps backward to whatever position it was in five seconds earlier--regaining the HP and mana from that time. No effect on cooldown, gold or experience.

abilities.name: Mana Break
abilities.description: There is no description for this ability.

abilities.name: Venomous Gale
abilities.description: Launches a ball of venom in a line, poisoning enemy units so that they take both initial damage and damage over time, as well as suffering slowed movement. Venomous Gale deals damage every 3 seconds over its duration.

abilities.name: Poison Sting
abilities.description: Adds poison damage to Venomancer's normal attacks and slowing movement speed.

abilities.name: Plague Ward
abilities.description: Summons a plague ward to attack enemy units and structures. The ward is immune to magic. Wards gain the Poison Sting level from Venomancer, dealing 50% of the full damage.

abilities.name: Poison Nova
abilities.description: A spreading ring of poison that does damage over time to enemy units around Venomancer. Poison Nova cannot deal lethal damage; targets will be left with at least 1 health.

abilities.name: Shackleshot
abilities.description: Shackles the target to an enemy unit or tree in a line directly behind it. If no unit or tree is present, the stun duration is reduced to 0.75.

abilities.name: Powershot
abilities.description: Windranger charges her bow for up to 1 second for a single powerful shot, which deals more damage the longer it is charged. The arrow damages enemies along its path. For each enemy that Powershot hits, its damage is reduced by 20%.

abilities.name: Windrun
abilities.description: Increases movement speed and adds evasion from all physical attacks, while slowing movement of nearby enemies.

abilities.name: Focus Fire
abilities.description: Windranger channels the wind to gain 475 additional attack speed against a single enemy unit or structure, though with a reduction to her attack damage. Extra damage from secondary item effects is not reduced. Lasts 20 seconds.

abilities.name: Paralyzing Cask
abilities.description: Launches a cask of paralyzing powder that ricochets between enemy units, stunning and damaging those it hits.

abilities.name: Voodoo Restoration
abilities.description: Witch Doctor focuses his magic to heal nearby allied units, costing Witch Doctor mana every second Voodoo restoration is active.
actions: Max Health as Heal per Second

abilities.name: Maledict
abilities.description: Curses all enemy Heroes in a small area, causing them to take a set amount of damage each second, as well as bursts of damage every 4 seconds based on how much health they have lost since the curse began.

abilities.name: Death Ward
abilities.description: Summons a deadly ward to attack enemy heroes within it's attack range. Lasts a maximum of 8 seconds.

abilities.name: Wraithfire Blast
abilities.description: Wraith King sears an enemy unit with spectral fire, dealing damage and stunning, then dealing damage over time and slowing the target.

abilities.name: Vampiric Aura
abilities.description: Nearby friendly heroes restore health based on the damage they deal when attacking enemy units. Has 50% effect on ranged allied heroes. Does not affect allied creeps.

abilities.name: Mortal Strike
abilities.description: Wraith King passively gains a chance to deal bonus damage on an attack. Every two kills on an enemy unit adds a skeleton charge. Skeletons respawn once when killed.
actions: Number of Kills to Gain Charge

abilities.name: Reincarnation
abilities.description: Wraith King's form regroups after death, allowing him to resurrect when killed in battle. Upon death, enemy units in a 900 radius will be slowed.

abilities.name: Arc Lightning
abilities.description: Hurls a bolt of lightning that leaps through nearby enemy units.

abilities.name: Lightning Bolt
abilities.description: Calls down a bolt of lightning to strike an enemy unit, causing damage and a mini-stun. When cast, Lightning Bolt briefly provides unobstructed vision and True Sight around the target in a 750 radius. Can be cast on the ground, affecting the closest enemy hero in 375 range.

abilities.name: Static Field
abilities.description: Zeus shocks any enemy hit by his abilities, causing damage proportional to their current health.

abilities.name: Thundergod's Wrath
abilities.description: Strikes all enemy heroes with a bolt of lightning, no matter where they may be. Thundergod's Wrath also provides True Sight around each hero struck. If an enemy hero is invisible, it takes no damage, but the True Sight is still created at that hero's location.

abilities.name: Nimbus
abilities.description: Creates a storm cloud anywhere on the map that automatically casts Lightning Bolt on nearby enemies.

abilities.name: Arctic Burn
abilities.description: Winter Wyvern soars upon an arctic wind, granting her unobstructed movement and allowing her to exhale a blistering chill into each attack. While soaring, her attacks travel further and faster, and slow enemies with a burning freeze that strips them of 6%/7%/8%/9% of their current health each second. Her sight is also hardened against night's chill, granting her 400 additional vision range at night while soaring.
actions: Current Health as Damage per Second

abilities.name: Splinter Blast
abilities.description: Launches a ball of brittle ice towards an enemy. The ice shatters on impact, leaving the primary target completely unaffected, while hurling damaging splinters into nearby enemies in a 500 radius. Enemies struck by these splinters are slowed by 30%.

abilities.name: Cold Embrace
abilities.description: Encases an ally in an icy cocoon, freezing them solid while healing a base amount as well as a percentage of their maximum health each second. The cocoon blocks all physical damage.
actions: Max Health as Heal Per Second

abilities.name: Winter's Curse
abilities.description: Winter Wyvern freezes an enemy in place while striking those nearby with a maddening curse which causes them to attack their frozen ally with increased attack speed. The frozen ally and those cursed to attack their ally are immune to all damage from their enemies with the exception of Winter Wyvern or her controlled units.

abilities.name: Cold Feet
abilities.description: Places a frozen hex on an enemy unit that deals damage over time, but can be dispelled by moving away from the initial cast point. If the enemy unit doesn't move out of the given range, it will be stunned and frozen in place after 4 seconds.

abilities.name: Ice Vortex
abilities.description: Creates a vortex of icy energy that slows movement speed and increases magic damage done to enemies in its range.

abilities.name: Chilling Touch
abilities.description: Enhances Ancient Apparition's attack with increased range, heavy magic damage, and movement slow.

abilities.name: Ice Blast
abilities.description: Launches a tracer towards any location of the battlefield, which must be triggered again to mark the area to be blasted by a damaging explosion of hail. The further the tracer travels, the larger the explosion will be. Enemies caught in the explosion, or who touched the icy ball of hail as it travels, are frostbitten, taking damage and prevented from regenerating or healing. If a frostbitten unit's health drops below a certain percentage, they will instantly shatter.

abilities.name: Release
abilities.description: Releases the ice blast to explode at the tracer's current location.

abilities.name: Mana Break
abilities.description: Burns an opponent's mana on each attack. Mana Break deals 50% of the mana burned as damage to the target. Mana Break has 50% effect if caused by illusions.

abilities.name: Blink
abilities.description: Short distance teleportation that allows Anti-Mage to move in and out of combat.

abilities.name: Counterspell
abilities.description: Passively grants you magic resistance. Can be activated to create an anti-magic shell around you that sends any targeted spells back towards enemies instead of affecting you.

abilities.name: Mana Void
abilities.description: For each point of mana missing by the target unit, damage is dealt to it and surrounding enemies. The main target is also mini-stunned.

abilities.name: Berserker's Call
abilities.description: Axe taunts nearby enemy units, forcing them to attack him, while he gains bonus armor during the duration.

abilities.name: Battle Hunger
abilities.description: Enrages an enemy unit, causing it to be slowed and take damage over time until it kills another unit or the duration ends. Axe gains movement speed for each unit affected with Battle Hunger, half speed from creeps.

abilities.name: Counter Helix
abilities.description: When attacked, Axe has a chance to perform a helix counter attack, dealing pure damage to all nearby enemies.

abilities.name: Culling Blade
abilities.description: Axe spots a weakness and strikes, instantly killing an enemy unit with low health, or dealing moderate damage otherwise. When an enemy hero is killed with Culling Blade, its cooldown is reset, and Axe and nearby allied units gain bonus movement speed.

abilities.name: Flux
abilities.description: Infuses a lone enemy unit with swirling, volatile energy, slowing its movement speed and dealing damage over time. The effect is muted if another enemy unit is near the target.

abilities.name: Magnetic Field
abilities.description: Generates a circular distortion field of magnetic energy that protects allied heroes and buildings within it by evading attacks coming from outside the field.

abilities.name: Spark Wraith
abilities.description: Summons a Spark Wraith that slowly materializes and patrols a targeted area until an enemy comes within its range. Once a target has been found the wraith fuses with them, dealing magical damage and slowing the unit.

abilities.name: Tempest Double
abilities.description: Briefly refocusing its fractured elements into a single form, the Arc Warden is able to create a perfect electrical duplication of itself. The duplicate can use all of Arc Warden's current items and spells, except most consumables and items that drop on death. The duplicate has separate item and ability cooldowns. The Tempest Double gives bounty gold to enemies when killed.

abilities.name: Rune Forge
abilities.description: Creates a random rune in front of you.

abilities.name: Mist Coil
abilities.description: Abaddon releases a coil of deathly mist that can damage an enemy unit or heal a friendly unit at the cost of some of Abaddon's health.

abilities.name: Aphotic Shield
abilities.description: Summons dark energies around an ally unit, creating a shield that absorbs a set amount of damage before expiring. When the shield is destroyed it will burst and deal damage equal to the amount it could absorb to an area around it. Removes certain types of negative buffs and stuns on cast.

abilities.name: Curse of Avernus
abilities.description: Abaddon strikes an enemy, slowing the target's movement speed. If the target gets hit 4 times, they become affected by a chilling curse causing them to be silenced and slowed, and all attacks against them gain an attack speed boost.

abilities.name: Borrowed Time
abilities.description: When activated, all damage dealt to you will heal instead of harm. Most negative buffs will also be removed. If the ability is not on cooldown, it will automatically activate if your health falls below 400.

abilities.name: Acid Spray
abilities.description: Sprays high-pressure acid across a target area. Enemy units who step across the contaminated terrain take damage per second and have their armor reduced.

abilities.name: Unstable Concoction
abilities.description: Alchemist brews up an unstable concoction that he can throw at an enemy hero, to stun and deal damage in an area around the explosion. The longer the concoction brews, the more damage it deals and the longer the stun. After 5 seconds, the brew reaches its maximum damage and stun time. However, after 5.5 seconds, the concoction will explode on Alchemist himself if not thrown.

abilities.name: Unstable Concoction Throw
abilities.description: Throw it before it blows up!

abilities.name: Greevil's Greed
abilities.description: Alchemist synthesizes additional gold from his enemies and bounty runes. With each kill, Alchemist earns base bonus gold and extra bonus gold. If Alchemist kills another unit which yields gold within the next 40 seconds, an additional instance of Extra Bonus Gold is added to the total. Additionally, causes bounty runes to yield more gold.

abilities.name: Chemical Rage
abilities.description: Alchemist causes his Ogre to enter a chemically induced rage, reducing base attack cooldown and increasing movement speed and health regeneration.

abilities.name: Aghanim's Scepter Synth
abilities.description: Alchemist melts down Aghanim's Scepter to grant an allied hero all Aghanim's Scepter upgrades. When you have a Scepter of your own, you will gain bonus damage and spell amplification for each gifted Scepter.
actions: Attack Damage Bonus per Gifted Scepter
Spell Damage Amplification Bonus per Gifted Scepter

abilities.name: Nightmare
abilities.description: Puts the target enemy or friendly Hero to sleep. Sleeping units are awakened when damaged. If the target was directly attacked, the Nightmare passes to the attacking unit. Bane can attack nightmared targets freely.

abilities.name: Nightmare End
abilities.description: Ends all ongoing Nightmares.

abilities.name: Brain Sap
abilities.description: Feasts on the vital energies of an enemy unit, healing Bane and dealing damage.

abilities.name: Enfeeble
abilities.description: Bane's abilities enfeeble his targets, lowering the affected unit's magic and status resistances.

abilities.name: Fiend's Grip
abilities.description: Grips an enemy unit, disabling it and causing heavy damage over time, while stealing mana every 0.5 second based on the unit's maximum mana.

abilities.name: Sticky Napalm
abilities.description: Drenches an area in sticky oil, amplifying damage from Batrider's attacks and abilities and slowing the movement speed and turn rate of enemies in the area. Additional casts of Sticky Napalm continue to increase damage, up to 10 stacks. The extra damage is halved against creeps.

abilities.name: Flamebreak
abilities.description: Hurls an explosive cocktail that explodes when it reaches the target location, knocking back, and dealing damage over time to enemies in the area.

abilities.name: Firefly
abilities.description: Batrider takes to the skies, laying down a trail of flames from the air. The fire damages any enemies it touches, and destroys trees below Batrider. Batrider has bonus day/night vision while Firefly is active.

abilities.name: Flaming Lasso
abilities.description: Lassoes an enemy and drags them in Batrider's wake. Victims cannot be dragged over impassable terrain. Dragged units cannot move, attack, or use abilities. Teleporting or blinking will break the lasso.

abilities.name: Thunder Clap
abilities.description: Slams the ground, dealing damage and slowing the movement speed and attack rate of nearby enemy units.

abilities.name: Cinder Brew
abilities.description: Drenches an area in alcohol, causing enemy units to move slower and ignited once they take any spell damage. Duration is increased by 3 seconds when ignited.

abilities.name: Drunken Brawler
abilities.description: Goes into a drunken brawler state, granting you a chance to avoid attacks and to deal critical damage. Brewmaster moves with a varying amount of movement speed, alternating between 20% slower and 40% faster. Lasts 5 seconds.

abilities.name: Primal Split
abilities.description: Splits Brewmaster into elements, forming 3 specialized warriors, adept at survival, each with their own abilities. If any of them survive until the end of their summoned timer, the Brewmaster is reborn.

abilities.name: Hurl Boulder
abilities.description: Throws a boulder at a unit, doing damage and stunning it.

abilities.name: Spell Immunity
abilities.description: Immune to spells.

abilities.name: Demolish
abilities.description: Deals bonus damage to buildings.

abilities.name: Thunder Clap
abilities.description: Slams the ground, dealing damage and slowing the movement speed and attack rate of nearby enemy units.

abilities.name: Dispel Magic
abilities.description: Damages summoned units in an area and purges most buffs or debuffs.

abilities.name: Cyclone
abilities.description: Encloses a unit in a tornado, removing it from the battlefield.

abilities.name: Wind Walk
abilities.description: Provides temporary invisibility, bonus movement speed and attack damage when invisible.

abilities.name: Cinder Brew
abilities.description: Drenches an area in alcohol, causing enemy units to move slower and ignited once they take any spell damage. Duration is increased by 3 seconds when ignited.

abilities.name: Permanent Immolation
abilities.description: Burns nearby enemy units.

abilities.name: Drunken Brawler
abilities.description: Goes into a drunken brawler state, granting you a chance to avoid attacks and to deal critical damage. Brewmaster moves with a varying amount of movement speed, alternating between 20% slower and 40% faster. Lasts 5 seconds.

abilities.name: Wild Axes
abilities.description: Beastmaster sends his axes flying and calls them home again, slicing through enemy units and trees along their path. Each axe can hit an enemy once, and amplifies subsequent damage from Beastmaster and his units.

abilities.name: Call of the Wild Boar
abilities.description: Beastmaster calls forth a Boar to aid in the battlefield.

abilities.name: Call of the Wild Hawk
abilities.description: Beastmaster sends an invisible Hawk to scout an area.

abilities.name: Inner Beast
abilities.description: Untaps the inner fury of nearby allies, passively increasing their attack speed.

abilities.name: Primal Roar
abilities.description: Beastmaster lets loose a deafening roar that stuns, and shoves open a path to its target. All units in the path of the roar are damaged, while units shoved aside by the roar have their movement and attack speed slowed. Additionally, Beastmaster and his units gain 40% movement speed for 3 seconds.

abilities.name: Poison
abilities.description: Inflicts a poison that slows attack and movement speeds.

abilities.name: Bloodrage
abilities.description: Drives you into a bloodthirsty rage during which causes you to attack faster and deal more spell damage at the cost of a percentage of your health per second. Provides half attack speed to allied heroes.
actions: Max Health as Cost Per Second

abilities.name: Blood Rite
abilities.description: Bloodseeker baptizes an area in sacred blood. After 2.9 seconds the ritual completes, causing any enemies caught in the area to take damage and become silenced.

abilities.name: Thirst
abilities.description: Bloodseeker is invigorated by the wounds of his enemies, restoring some life when he kills an enemy unit. Also gains bonus movement speed when an enemy hero's health falls below 75%, with the bonuses increasing as their health falls further. If an enemy hero's health falls below 25%, he will also gain vision and True Sight of that hero. Bonuses stack per hero. Unlocks max movement speed for Bloodseeker.
actions: Max Move Speed Bonus per Hero

abilities.name: Rupture
abilities.description: Causes an enemy unit's skin to rupture. If the unit moves, it takes damage based on the distance moved. The damage is dealt through spell immunity.

abilities.name: Shuriken Toss
abilities.description: Hurls a deadly shuriken at an enemy unit, dealing damage and mini-stunning the target. The shuriken will bounce to any Tracked units who are within a 1200 radius of each other.

abilities.name: Jinada
abilities.description: Bounty Hunter plans his next hit, dealing bonus damage and stealing some unreliable gold.

abilities.name: Shadow Walk
abilities.description: Bounty Hunter becomes invisible and gains the ability to move through other units until he attacks or uses an ability. If he breaks the invisibility with an attack, that attack will slow the target's movement speed.

abilities.name: Track
abilities.description: Tracks an enemy hero, granting True Sight of the target, and information on how much gold it is carrying. You move fast when near the tracked unit and deal critical strikes when attacking it. If the target dies, Bounty Hunter and nearby heroes collect a bonus bounty of gold. Casting Track does not take you out of invisibility.

abilities.name: Penitence
abilities.description: Forces an enemy unit to move slower and for allies to attack it more quickly.

abilities.name: Holy Persuasion
abilities.description: Chen takes control of an enemy or neutral creep. If the persuaded creep's base health is naturally below the health minimum, its base health will be raised to the health minimum. Converted creeps will have increased movement speed and bonus damage.

abilities.name: Divine Favor
abilities.description: Passively provides an aura that grants increased health regeneration and amplifies all health restore by a percentage.Can be cast on allies to teleport them to Chen. If cast on Chen, all units controlled by Chen will be teleported to him. Taking damage will dispel the buff.

abilities.name: Hand of God
abilities.description: Heals all allied heroes on the map as well as all units under Chen's control.

abilities.name: Viscous Nasal Goo
abilities.description: Covers a target in snot, causing it to have reduced armor and movement speed. Multiple casts stack and refresh the duration.

abilities.name: Quill Spray
abilities.description: Sprays enemy units with quills dealing damage in an area of effect around Bristleback. Deals bonus damage for every time a unit was hit by Quill Spray in the last 14 seconds.

abilities.name: Bristleback
abilities.description: Bristleback takes less damage if hit on the sides or rear. If Bristleback takes 210 damage from the rear, he releases a Quill Spray of the current level.

abilities.name: Warpath
abilities.description: Bristleback works himself up into a fury every time he casts a spell, increasing his movement speed and damage.

abilities.name: Hoof Stomp
abilities.description: Slams the ground, stunning and damaging nearby enemy units.

abilities.name: Double Edge
abilities.description: Centaur strikes a mighty blow at melee range, damaging both himself and a small area around the target. Deals extra damage based on your strength. Centaur cannot die from Double Edge.

abilities.name: Retaliate
abilities.description: Centaur counters all attacks, dealing damage back to the attacker. Returns a fixed amount plus a percentage based on your strength. Deals half damage to towers.

abilities.name: Stampede
abilities.description: Centaur leads all allies into a vicious charge causing them to move through units at max speed and stop any enemy units they trample. Trampled enemies take damage based on Centaur Warrunner's strength. Each enemy can be trampled once.

abilities.name: Spawn Spiderlings
abilities.description: Broodmother injects her young into an enemy unit, dealing damage. The spiderlings will hatch if the target is killed while under this influence.

abilities.name: Spin Web
abilities.description: Spins a large web that grants Broodmother a passive movement speed increase, gives free movement, and boosts regeneration while in its vicinity. Spin Web charges restore every 45 seconds. Spin Web can be cast from anywhere as long as the new web touches an existing web. Webs never expire, and can be manually destroyed. When the maximum limit of webs is exceeded, the oldest web disappears.

abilities.name: Incapacitating Bite
abilities.description: Broodmother's venom cripples enemy units, causing her attacks to slow and giving the affected unit a chance to miss its attacks.

abilities.name: Insatiable Hunger
abilities.description: A violent lust for vital fluids increases Broodmother's attack damage and gives her a vampiric attack.

abilities.name: Destroy Spin Web
abilities.description: Destroys the selected Spin Web.

abilities.name: Poison Sting
abilities.description: Poisons and slows enemies with each attack.

abilities.name: Spawn Spiderite
abilities.description: Applies debuff on attack. If debuffed unit dies, a spiderite will spawn.

abilities.name: Chaos Bolt
abilities.description: Throws a mysterious bolt of energy at the target unit. It stuns for a random duration and deals random damage.

abilities.name: Reality Rift
abilities.description: Teleports you, any images you have and the target unit to a point along the line between the two of you. Reduces armor of the enemy unit for 6 seconds.

abilities.name: Chaos Strike
abilities.description: Chaos Knight's attacks have a chance to deal a critical strike of varying strength, in addition to a lifesteal for percentage of the damage.

abilities.name: Phantasm
abilities.description: Summons several phantasmal copies of the Chaos Knight from alternate dimensions. The phantasms are strong illusions that deal 100% damage, but take 325% damage.

abilities.name: Strafe
abilities.description: Clinkz nimbly attacks with a barrage of arrows. Gains 100% evasion against ranged attackers and dramatically increases attack speed for a short time.

abilities.name: Searing Arrows
abilities.description: Imbues Clinkz's arrows with fire for extra damage.

abilities.name: Skeleton Walk
abilities.description: Clinkz moves invisibly through units until the moment he attacks or uses items.

abilities.name: Death Pact
abilities.description: Clinkz consumes the target enemy unit or friendly unit, gaining max health and damage based on its current health.
actions: Target Max Health as Health Bonus
Target Max Health as Attack Damage Bonus

abilities.name: Burning Army
abilities.description: Clinkz summons an army of fiery ranged skeleton archers. Archers are immobile and die with 2 attacks from a hero. Skeletons deal a percentage of Clinkz' damage, use his current Searing Arrows ability and attack only heroes. Attack range is equal to Clinkz's attack range.

tenth: Skeleton Walk Exit Summons A Burning Army Skeleton

abilities.name: Bramble Maze
abilities.description: Dark Willow creates a maze of brambles that grow in the target area after 0.5 seconds. Enemies that walk into a bramble are rooted and take damage over time.

abilities.name: Shadow Realm
abilities.description: Dark Willow recedes into the shadows, becoming untargetable. Her next attack has increased attack range and deals bonus magic damage, and will end Shadow Realm. Damage scales based on how long she remains under the effects of Shadow Realm, the maximum being reached after 3.5 seconds.

abilities.name: Cursed Crown
abilities.description: Dark Willow casts an ancient fae curse on the target. After a delay, the target and nearby enemies are stunned.

abilities.name: Bedlam
abilities.description: Dark Willow's pet wisp roams around her for the duration, rapidly attacking nearby enemies. Bedlam cannot be used while Terrorize is active.

abilities.name: Terrorize
abilities.description: Dark Willow releases her pet wisp to terrorize her enemies. After a short delay, all enemies in the target area become fearful and run toward their home fountain. Terrorize cannot be used while Bedlam is active.

abilities.name: Crystal Nova
abilities.description: A burst of damaging frost slows enemy movement and attack rate in the targeted area.

abilities.name: Frostbite
abilities.description: Encases an enemy unit in ice, prohibiting movement and attack, while dealing damage over time. Lasts 10 seconds on creeps level 6 or lower.

abilities.name: Arcane Aura
abilities.description: Gives additional mana regeneration to all friendly units on the map. This bonus is increased for Crystal Maiden.

abilities.name: Freezing Field
abilities.description: Surrounds Crystal Maiden with random icy explosions that slow enemies and deal massive damage. Grants bonus armor while channeling. Lasts 10 seconds.

abilities.name: Battery Assault
abilities.description: Discharges high-powered shrapnel at random nearby enemy units, dealing minor magical damage and ministun.

abilities.name: Power Cogs
abilities.description: Forms a barrier of energized cogs around Clockwerk, trapping any units that are near. Enemies outside the trap that touch a cog are knocked back, losing health and mana. Once a cog has delivered a shock, it will power down. Cogs can be destroyed by enemy attacks, but Clockwerk can destroy them with just one.

abilities.name: Rocket Flare
abilities.description: Fires a global range flare that explodes over a given area, damaging enemies and providing vision for 6 seconds.

abilities.name: Hookshot
abilities.description: Fires a grappling device rapidly at the target location. If the hook hits a unit, Clockwerk launches himself into the target, stunning and dealing damage. Any enemies Clockwerk collides with along the way are damaged and stunned.

abilities.name: Overclocking
abilities.description: Resets Clockwerk's ability cooldowns and grants him bonus movement and attack speed for a duration. Clockwerk becomes stunned after the duration runs out.

abilities.name: Vacuum
abilities.description: Dark Seer creates a vacuum over the target area that sucks in enemy units, disrupting them and dealing damage.

abilities.name: Ion Shell
abilities.description: Surrounds the target unit with a bristling shield that damages enemy units in an area around it.

abilities.name: Surge
abilities.description: Charges a target friendly unit with power, giving it a brief burst of movement speed and removes unit collisions. Allows the unit to reach maximum movement speed and cannot be slowed.

abilities.name: Wall of Replica
abilities.description: Raises a wall of warping light that slows and creates replicas of any enemy hero who crosses it. Enemy replicas serve at the Dark Seer's will. Replicas last until they are destroyed, or until the wall's duration ends.

abilities.name: Poison Touch
abilities.description: Releases a cone of poison that strikes multiple enemy units. Deals damage over time and slows the targets. Anytime the targets get attacked, the debuff duration is refreshed.

abilities.name: Shallow Grave
abilities.description: An ally blessed with Shallow Grave, no matter how close to death, cannot die while under its protection.

abilities.name: Shadow Wave
abilities.description: Sends out a bolt of power that arcs between allies, healing them while damaging any units standing nearby. Dazzle is always healed by Shadow Wave.

abilities.name: Bad Juju
abilities.description: Passively reduces cooldowns on your abilities and items. Anytime you cast a spell, all nearby enemies will have their armor reduced. Debuff stacks and refreshes duration.
actions: Number of Attack Targets per Cast

abilities.name: Crypt Swarm
abilities.description: Sends a swarm of winged beasts to savage enemy units in front of Death Prophet.

abilities.name: Silence
abilities.description: Prevents enemy units in a target area from casting spells.

abilities.name: Spirit Siphon
abilities.description: Creates a spirit link between Death Prophet and an enemy unit, draining 14 + 1%/2.5%/4%/5.5% Max HP per second and steal 4%/6%/8%/10% movement speed from the enemy.

abilities.name: Exorcism
abilities.description: Unleashes evil spirits to drain the life of nearby enemy units and structures. At the end of the spell's duration, Death Prophet is healed in proportion to the damage dealt. Lasts 0 seconds.

abilities.name: Thunder Strike
abilities.description: Repeatedly strikes the targeted unit with lightning. Each strike damages nearby enemy units in a small radius and slows enemy movement speed and attack speed by 100 for 0.1 seconds. Provides vision of its target.

abilities.name: Glimpse
abilities.description: Teleports the target hero back to where it was 4 seconds ago. Instantly kills illusions.

abilities.name: Kinetic Field
abilities.description: After a short formation time, creates a circular barrier of kinetic energy that enemies can't pass.

abilities.name: Static Storm
abilities.description: Creates a damaging static storm that also silences all enemy units in the area for the duration. The damage starts off weak, but increases in power over the duration.

abilities.name: Frost Arrows
abilities.description: Adds a freezing effect to Drow's attacks, slowing enemy movement and dealing bonus damage. Slow lasts 1.5 seconds.

abilities.name: Gust
abilities.description: Releases a wave that silences and knocks back enemy units. Knockback distance is relative to how close they are to you.

abilities.name: Multishot
abilities.description: Drow releases a flurry of arrows in continuous salvos, hitting enemies for extra damage and applying longer duration Frost Arrows. Lasts up to 1.75 seconds.
actions: Attack Range as Travel Distance Multiplier

abilities.name: Marksmanship
abilities.description: Drow's experiences in battle grant her a chance to launch arrows with incredible accuracy and effectiveness. Pierces through the enemy's defenses, ignoring their base armor. Grants Drow and nearby ranged heroes with bonus agility based on Drow's current agility. This ability is disabled if there is an enemy hero within 400 range.

abilities.name: Breathe Fire
abilities.description: Unleashes a breath of fire in front of Dragon Knight that burns enemies and reduces the damage their attacks deal.

abilities.name: Dragon Tail
abilities.description: Dragon Knight smites an enemy unit in melee range with his shield, stunning it while dealing minor damage. When in Elder Dragon Form, the cast range increases to 400.

abilities.name: Dragon Blood
abilities.description: The life blood of the Dragon improves health regeneration and strengthens armor.

abilities.name: Elder Dragon Form
abilities.description: Dragon Knight takes the form of one of three powerful elder dragons, increasing his speed, and Dragon Tail's range, while granting him new powers.LEVEL 1 Green Dragon - Corrosive Breath: attacks deal 20 poison damage per second for 5 seconds. Works on structures.LEVEL 2 Red Dragon - Splash Attack: attacks damage all enemy units in a 300 radius for 0%/75%/75%/115%, with Corrosive Breath added to the targets.LEVEL 3 Blue Dragon - Frost Breath: slows movement speed by 40% and attack speed by 40 of enemy units in Splash Attack range for 3 seconds, with Corrosive Breath added to the targets.

abilities.name: Boulder Smash
abilities.description: Earth Spirit smashes the target enemy or ally, sending them in the direction he is facing. If Earth Spirit targets an area, he will smash the nearest Stone Remnant in a 200 radius. The travelling unit or Remnant damages all enemy units it hits. If an enemy is hit by a Stone Remnant, they are also slowed. Stone Remnants travel further than other units.

abilities.name: Rolling Boulder
abilities.description: Earth Spirit gathers himself into a boulder and, after a 0.6s delay, rolls toward the target location, damaging and stunning enemy units. He will stop if he collides with an enemy hero or is stunned. If he rolls over a Stone Remnant, he will travel further and faster, and stun enemies for longer.

abilities.name: Geomagnetic Grip
abilities.description: Earth Spirit pulls the target Stone Remnant. Enemies struck by the gripped target will be silenced and take damage.

abilities.name: Stone Remnant
abilities.description: Call a Stone Remnant to the target location. Stone Remnants have no vision and are invulnerable, and can be used with Earth Spirit's abilities. Calling a Stone Remnant consumes a charge, which recharge over time.
